lead_paragraph: Officials at southern Utah's Zion National Park say they're being overrun by visitors, even during the usual winter lull.
snippet: Officials at southern Utah's Zion National Park say they're being overrun by visitors, even during the usual winter lull....

headline.main: Officials: National Park in Utah Bursting, Even in Winter
headline.print_headline: Officials: National Park in Utah Bursting, Even in Winter
